trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of tabs in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel"></xref> class.
Positions and sizes the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel"></xref>.
The size that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel"></xref> needs to position its child elements.
The actual size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
`true` in all cases.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
`false` in all cases.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
0.0 in all cases.
Gets the horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
The horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
This property has no default value.
Gets the horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
The horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
This property has no default value.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
Scrolls the content left by one line.
Scrolls the content right by one line.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> object is visible.
The object to make visible.
A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.
The rectangle that is visible.

Measures the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel"></xref> in preparation of arranging them during the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)"></xref> pass.
The maximum size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel"></xref>.
The desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel"></xref>.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> element that controls scrolling behavior.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> element that controls scrolling behavior.
Sets the amount that content is horizontal offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The amount that content is horizontally offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
This API is not implemented.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
0.0 in all cases.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
0.0 in all cases.
Gets the horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
The horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
This property has no default value.
